name: Scarborough

name: Noordhoek

name: Llandudno
description: You’d be hard-pressed to find a more beautiful setting for a sunset than Llundudno. The amphitheatre of boulders and mountains that surround the beach light up in the evening glow, and provide a sheltered corner even if the wind is blowing.

name: Yzerfontein
